newsitem.title: USA: Viisage, ImageWare in facial-ID alliance.
newsitem.headline: Viisage, ImageWare in facial-ID alliance.

text.p: Viisage Technology Inc said on Monday it signed an alliance agreement with ImageWare Software Inc to integrate Viisage's facial-recognition technology into ImageWare's C.R.I.M.E.S. software suite for law-enforcement agencies.
The intention is to unite a digital booking, facial composite and image enhancement system with the capability of searching a database of images and retrieving a match, the company said.
Viisage makes products intended to deter fraud, cut identification costs and improve security.
ImageWare, a privately held company based in San Diego, makes PC-based, digital-imaging products, with a primary focus on law-enforcement.
